x_align.name: X Alignment
x_align.tooltip:
Horizontal alignment:
- from_left: Calculate offset from left
- from_right: Calculate offset from right (enables tight right alignment)

y_align.name: Y Alignment
y_align.tooltip:
Vertical alignment:
- from_top: Calculate offset from top
- from_bottom: Calculate offset from bottom (enables tight bottom alignment)

x_offset.name: X Offset
x_offset.tooltip: Horizontal offset pixels, can be negative (use with alignment)

y_offset.name: Y Offset
y_offset.tooltip: Vertical offset pixels, can be negative (use with alignment)

scale_mode.name: Scale Mode
scale_mode.tooltip:
Scaling mode:
- relative_to_overlay: scale by overlay's size
- relative_to_background_width: width = scale × bg width
- relative_to_background_height: height = scale × bg height

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Complete Photoshop Blend Modes:
normal: Normal - Direct overlay
darken: Darken - Select darker pixels
multiply: Multiply - Colors multiply to darken
color_burn: Color Burn - Darken with increased contrast
linear_burn: Linear Burn - Linear darkening
lighten: Lighten - Select brighter pixels
screen: Screen - Inverse multiply to lighten
color_dodge: Color Dodge - Lighten with reduced contrast
linear_dodge: Linear Dodge - Direct addition to lighten
overlay: Overlay - Combines multiply and screen
soft_light: Soft Light - Gentle contrast enhancement
hard_light: Hard Light - Strong contrast enhancement
vivid_light: Vivid Light - Extreme contrast effect
linear_light: Linear Light - Linear contrast adjustment
pin_light: Pin Light - Replace colors based on brightness
hard_mix: Hard Mix - Creates solid color results
difference: Difference - Absolute difference of colors
exclusion: Exclusion - Softer difference effect
subtract: Subtract - Direct color subtraction
divide: Divide - Color division operation
hue: Hue - Change only hue, keep saturation & lightness
saturation: Saturation - Change only saturation
color: Color - Change hue & saturation, keep lightness
luminosity: Luminosity - Change only lightness

RGBA_mode.name: RGBA Mode
RGBA_mode.tooltip: Force RGBA output. If no alpha, add opaque channel.

fill_opacity.name: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.tooltip:
Original image fill opacity:
- 1.0: Normal image display
- 0.0: Hollow effect, shadow only
- 0.5: Semi-transparent image + shadow

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Drop shadow blend mode:
- normal: Normal blending
- multiply: Multiply, classic shadow
- color_burn: Color burn, deep shadow
- linear_burn: Linear burn, soft shadow
- darken: Darken, gentle shadow

auto_expand_canvas.name: Auto Expand Canvas
auto_expand_canvas.tooltip:
Auto expand canvas:
- True: Auto expand canvas when shadow exceeds bounds
- False: Shadow is clipped to original canvas size

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Stroke blend mode:
- normal: Normal blending, direct overlay
- multiply: Multiply, darkens colors
- screen: Screen, lightens colors
- overlay: Overlay, enhances contrast
- color_burn: Color burn, deeper shadows

fill_opacity.name: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.tooltip:
Original image fill opacity:
- 1.0: Normal image display
- 0.0: Hollow effect, stroke only
- 0.5: Semi-transparent image + stroke

auto_expand_canvas.name: Auto Expand Canvas
auto_expand_canvas.tooltip:
Auto expand canvas:
- True: Auto expand canvas when stroke exceeds bounds
- False: Stroke is clipped to original canvas size

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Outer glow blend mode:
- normal: Normal blending
- screen: Screen, classic glow effect
- color_dodge: Color dodge, intense glow
- linear_dodge: Linear dodge, soft glow
- lighten: Lighten, gentle glow

fill_opacity.name: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.tooltip:
Original image fill opacity:
- 1.0: Normal image display
- 0.0: Hollow effect, glow only
- 0.5: Semi-transparent image + glow

auto_expand_canvas.name: Auto Expand Canvas
auto_expand_canvas.tooltip:
Auto expand canvas:
- True: Auto expand canvas when glow exceeds bounds
- False: Glow is clipped to original canvas size

channel.name: Channel
channel.tooltip:
Channel to extract:
- red: Red channel
- green: Green channel (often best for green screen)
- blue: Blue channel
- alpha: Alpha channel (if available)
- luminance: Luminance (0.299*R + 0.587*G + 0.114*B)

mask_mode.name: Mask Mode
mask_mode.tooltip:
Mask application mode:
- alpha: Use mask as alpha channel
- multiply: Multiply image by mask (darken)

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.tooltip: Threshold for mask (values below this become transparent)

gradient_type.name: Gradient Type
gradient_type.tooltip:
Gradient type:
- linear: Linear gradient
- radial: Radial gradient from center
- angular: Angular/conical gradient
- reflected: Reflected linear gradient

angle.name: Angle
angle.tooltip: Gradient angle in degrees (for linear and reflected types)

size_mode.name: Size Mode
size_mode.tooltip:
Size mode:
- from_image: Use reference image size
- custom: Specify custom width and height

width.name: Width
width.tooltip: Width in pixels (used in custom mode)

height.name: Height
height.tooltip: Height in pixels (used in custom mode)

center_x.name: Center X
center_x.tooltip: Horizontal center position (0-1, for radial and angular)

center_y.name: Center Y
center_y.tooltip: Vertical center position (0-1, for radial and angular)

reference_image.name: Reference Image
reference_image.tooltip: Reference image for size (used when size_mode is from_image)
